definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be contentious, refractory, rebellious (NH id., Hiph.; Ar. maray III. dispute with; Syr. mariy Pa. contend with);—

definitions.title: Qal.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[מָרָה]] 1Ki 13:26; f. [[מָֽרְתָה]] Ho 14:1; [[מָרָָתָה]] Je 4:17; 2 ms. [[מָרִיתָ]] 1Ki 13:21 + 11 t. pf.; Inf. abs. [[מָרוֹ]] La 1:20; Pt. [[מׂרֶה]] 2Ki 14:26 (but rd. [[מר]], √ [[מרר]], Kmp:Kau [[כִּי מַר הוּא]]); [[מוֹרֶה]] De 21:18 + 3 t.; f. [[מׂרְאָה]] Zep 3:1 (rd. [[מׂרָה]]; metapl. form acc. to Ges:§ 75 R. 22); pl. [[מׂרִים]] Nu 20:10; —be disobedient, rebellious:
[[בֵּן סוֹרֵר וּמׂרֶה]] De 21:18, De 21:20 stubborn and rebellious son (towards father).

elsewhere towards God: [[דּׂר סוֹרֵר וּמׂרֶה]] Ps 78:8; ´[[לֵב סורר ומ]] Je 5:23; [[מוֹרְאָה ונגאלה הָעִיר]] Zep 3:1; [[הַמּׂרִים]] Nu 20:10 ye rebels (P); abs.
